com.reportmill.text

Class RMTextStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reportmill.text.RMTextStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMTypes, RMTextTypes, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RMTextStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements RMTextTypes, java.lang.Cloneable
    A class to hold style attributes for a text run.
